summary: The city's District Attorney is murdered, and a newspaper reporter investigates. He starts finding out that everything wasn't quite as cut and dried as it appeared to be.
cast: Lee Tracy|Tom Brown|Tina Thayer|Evelyn Brent|Jack La Rue|Ian Keith|Robert Middlemass|John Maxwell|John Sheehan|Harry C. Bradley|Forrest Taylor|Pat Costello|Roy Butler|Dick Gordon|Bill Hunter|Jack Kenney|Carl M. Leviness|Tony Martelli|Merrill McCormick|'Snub' Pollard|Arthur Thalasso|Herb Vigran
keywords: newspaper reporter|district attorney|murder|male female relationship|new york city
title: The Pay Off
